refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts LDAP schema's to LDB-compatible LDIF

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: oLschema2ldif is a simple tool that converts standard OpenLDAP schema files to a LDIF format that is understood by LDB.

listitem.para: OpenLDAP schema to read. If none are specified, the schema file will be read from standard input.
File to write ldif version of schema to.

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 4.0 of the Samba suite.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: ldb was written by Andrew Tridgell. oLschema2ldif was written by Simo Sorce.
